mapper.select: select rn, bno, title, content, writer, regdate, updatedate from ( select @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 as rn, A.* from tbl_board A, (SELECT @ROWNUM:=0) R where @ROWNUM <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} -1 ) cnt where rn > (#{pageNum} -1 ) * #{amount}
mapper.insert:
select *from (select max(bno)+1 from tbl_board) next
insert into tbl_board (bno,title,content,writer) values (#{bno},#{title}, #{content},#{writer})
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_board where bno > 0
